question: đánh giá, xem xét.
example: He immediately commenced an experiment to **assess** what had happened to the bacteria.
english-definition: to judge or decide the amount, value, quality, or importance of something.

question: làm kinh ngạc, làm ngạc nhiên.
example: What he found **astonished** him.
english-definition: to surprise someone very much.

question: bắt đầu, mở đầu (thường dùng trong bối cảnh trang trọng).
example: He immediately **commenced** an experiment to assess what had happened to the bacteria.
english-definition: to begin something.

question: bản chất, cốt lõi.
example: The **essence** of his ongoing work involved a type of bacteria.
english-definition: the basic or most important idea or quality of something.

question: chiết xuất, trích ra.
example: When he found them, he **extracted** them and put them into a pill.
english-definition: to remove or take out something.

question: tuyệt vời, phi thường.
example: Because of the success, the scientist was able to develop even more **fabulous** drugs to help people.
english-definition: very good; excellent.

question: sự vội vàng, sự hấp tấp.
example: In his **haste** to go on vacation, Alexander Fleming had left his laboratory in a mess.
english-definition: (too much) speed.

question: sự thôi thúc, sự bốc đồng.
example: While he was cleaning, he had an **impulse** to examine the fungus.
english-definition: a sudden strong wish to do something.

question: cái sau, cái đề cập sau (trong hai thứ).
example: The subsequent tests proved it was the **latter** reason.
english-definition: near or towards the end of something; the second of two people, things, or groups previously mentioned.

question: phân tử.
example: His next step was to find those **molecules** that had done it.
english-definition: the simplest unit of a chemical substance, usually a group of two or more atoms.

question: đang diễn ra, đang tiếp tục.
example: The essence of his **ongoing** work involved a type of bacteria.
english-definition: continuing to exist or develop, or happening at the present moment.

question: (thuộc về) dược, ngành dược.
example: One of the greatest **pharmaceutical** discoveries happened by accident.
english-definition: relating to the production of medicines.

question: chính xác, tỉ mỉ.
example: Though he was a messy scientist, his experiments were **precise**.
english-definition: exact and accurate in form, time, detail, or description.

question: sự gần gũi, sự lân cận.
example: He saw that whenever the fungus was in close **proximity** to the bacteria, the bacteria died.
english-definition: the state of being near in space or time.

question: sự công khai, sự chú ý của công chúng.
example: The discovery received a lot of **publicity**.
english-definition: attention given to someone or something by the media.

question: phương thuốc, cách chữa trị.
example: An infection caused by the bacteria was often terminal, and he was looking for a **remedy**.
english-definition: a successful way of curing an illness or dealing with a problem.

question: tầm quan trọng, ý nghĩa.
example: He thought that there might be some **significance** to the fungus.
english-definition: importance.

question: xảy ra sau đó, tiếp theo.
example: The **subsequent** tests proved it was the latter reason.
english-definition: happening after something else.

question: tổng hợp, nhân tạo.
example: All this time, he had been looking for a **synthetic** material to kill the bacteria.
english-definition: made or put together by people; not natural.

question: giai đoạn cuối, không thể chữa khỏi (bệnh).
example: An infection caused by the bacteria was often **terminal**, and he was looking for a remedy.
english-definition: (of a disease) causing death.
